definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to watch attentively/to fix one's attention on/to stare at/to gaze at

sentences.english: She stared towards them and they ran to his car and sped off.
sentences.chinese: 她緊盯着他們，他們倆嚇得趕緊跑進車開走了。

sentences.english: A bipartisan commission, created by Congress last year, is studying contractors closely.
sentences.chinese: 去年由國會創建的一個兩黨委員會正緊盯着承包商。

sentences.english: Inside the observatory a team of scientists closely follow the debris.
sentences.chinese: 在觀測所裏，科學家正緊盯著殘骸物。

sentences.english: All with their eyes intently fastened on the iron-clamped oaken door.
sentences.chinese: 他們一個個都緊盯着佈滿鐵釘的橡木牢門。

sentences.english: The dog stared at me and gave a low growl .
sentences.chinese: 這隻狗緊盯着我，而且發出低沉的吼叫聲。

sentences.english: His black, ophidian eyes fixed on Burak.
sentences.chinese: 他黑色的毒蛇眼珠緊盯在伯拉克身上。

sentences.english: I was forgetting all his faults, for which I had once kept a sharp look-out.
sentences.chinese: 我正在忘卻他所有的缺點，而過去我是緊盯不放的。

sentences.english: Mr. Lyu didn't talk and remained Mou light light, but tightly stared at to raise Chu.
sentences.chinese: 呂先生沒有說話，依舊眸光淡淡，卻緊盯着翹楚。

sentences.english: Focus on topics and ideas with large markets.
sentences.chinese: 緊盯大市場的主題和想法。

sentences.english: The policeman stared at his eyes when questioning him.
sentences.chinese: 警官在詢問他問題的時候，緊盯着他的雙眼。

sentences.english: He rubbed at the windshield and strained his vision over the sweep of headlight.
sentences.chinese: 他擦了擦擋風玻璃，緊盯着頭燈掃過的區域。

sentences.english: Now, Thomas is marking Pixon closely.
sentences.chinese: 現在托馬斯正緊盯着皮克森。

sentences.english: Pedestrians in great haste, and his eyes are fixed on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 但行人來去匆匆，眼睛中是緊盯着地面。

sentences.english: I expect that the Queen does not enjoy being gawked at.
sentences.chinese: 我想女王不喜歡被人愣愣地緊盯着看。

sentences.english: Dr. Roquefort’s eyes strafed the group and zeroed tight on the few he thought absolutely loyal.
sentences.chinese: 雷孟達的眼睛掃射這人羣緊盯着那些對他絕對忠誠的。

sentences.english: But the days of clockwatching for TB patients may soon be over.
sentences.chinese: 但是緊盯結核病患者的日子可能很快就要結束了。
